EmailTemplate.subject: Teladoc Health now offers Livongo Whole-Person Solutions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Address multiple chronic conditions while containing costs
Health plan members with chronic conditions account for 80% of overall healthcare costs while making up just 20% of the member population. Providing effective, convenient care management options for members with chronic conditions represents a significant health benefit as well as a cost‑saving opportunity.
Our three new solutions—each characterized by an anchor condition—work together to extend your benefits package and offer lifestyle behavior change tools, expert health coaching and personalized plans for reaching health goals.
For members - Lifestyle behavior change tools - Medication optimization - Expert health coaching - Provider coordination - Cellular‑connected devices - Personalized plans for reaching health goals
For clients - A simple, streamlined enterprise experience - Single implementation for multiple condition needs - Integrated billing, reporting and outcomes analysis
